testUtterance: Denne teksten lar deg teste kvaliteten på den norske stemmen.

voices.label: Pernille
voices.name: Microsoft Pernille Online (Natural) - Norwegian (Bokmål, Norway)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Finn
voices.name: Microsoft Finn Online (Natural) - Norwegian (Bokmål Norway)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Nora
voices.name: Nora (forbedret)
voices.note: While this is meant to identify the highest quality variant for the voice, it can be difficult to do so due to inconsistencies in how voices are exposed to browsers through the Web Speech API. Since the lowest quality of the voice is pre-loaded on Apple devices, the situation is worse than with other voices that need to be installed.

voices.label: Henrik
voices.name: Henrik
voices.note: This voice can be installed on all Apple devices and offers two variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Jon
voices.name: Microsoft Jon - Norwegian (Bokmål Norway)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Nora
voices.name: Nora
voices.note: This entry is meant to identify the pre-loaded variant of the voice, but it might not work on all browsers. In some cases, the previous entry might be the one detecting the pre-loaded variant unfortunately.

voices.label: Kvinnestemme 1
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-cfl-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-cfl-local

voices.label: Kvinnestemme 2
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-rfj-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-rfj-local

voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-tfs-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-tfs-local

voices.label: Mannsstemme 1
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-cmj-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-cmj-local

voices.label: Mannsstemme 2
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-tmg-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google nb-no-x-tmg-local

voices.label: Norsk stemme
voices.name: norsk bokmål Norge
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions
